thread.title: Great location, good room for a family, check your bill carefully
thread.title_full: Great location, good room for a family, check your bill carefully - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Grand Central, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Nina P
title: Great location, good room for a family, check your bill carefully
text:
The good, you cannot beat the location- only a block away from Grand Central station- the only downside to this is that there is a lot of traffic noise if you are not on one of the upper floors (where we have stayed before) - but hey its NYC There is also an excellent lounge area with a nice view, and snacks throughout the day. The one bedroom hotel room was perfect for a family as there was a sliding door with glass that gave the kids a separate space, while enabling us to see them.
The staff is also very nice and helpful- just take note that there is often only one person at the front desk and you may have to wait. Also, both times that we were there we noticed at check out that we were being charged for extras that we did not use, and in one case for an extra night.
Room Tip: higher floor See more room tips
